title: lwdid: Lee & Wooldridge Difference-in-Differences with Rolling Transformations for Panel Data
description: Python implementation of the Lee & Wooldridge difference-in-differences methods with unit-specific rolling transformations. Supports common timing and staggered adoption designs, demeaning and detrending transformations, seasonal adjustments, multiple estimators (RA, IPW, IPWRA, PSM), heteroskedasticity-robust inference, and randomization inference.
